org.apache.ddlutils.io
Class DataWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.ddlutils.io.PrettyPrintingXmlWriter
      org.apache.ddlutils.io.DataWriter

public class DataWriter
extends PrettyPrintingXmlWriter

Writes dyna beans matching a specified database model into an XML file.

          Creates a data writer instance using UTF-8 encoding.

                  String encoding)
